lead_paragraph: For the Roger Federer fans on Centre Court and the legions watching on televisions around the world it was a reassuring sight as the Swiss swept past Argentina's Guido Pella into the second round of Wimbledon on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Fit-Again Federer Gets Into His Stride
headline.main: Fit-Again Federer Gets Into His Stride

snippet: For the Roger Federer fans on Centre Court and the legions watching on televisions around the world it was a reassuring sight as the Swiss swept past Argentina's Guido Pella into the second round of Wimbledon on Monday....
